item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:#kredite Re: B√∂rsengehandelte Anleihen von P2P-Anbietern

Warum werden denn nun die alten Anleihen verl√§ngert, wenn doch eigentlich ein Umtausch stattfinden sollte? Waren zu viele wie ich und haben dem Umtausch nicht zugestimmt und h√§tten stattdessen nach R√ºckzahlung nue gekauft?

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:#kredite Re: B√∂rsengehandelte Anleihen von P2P-Anbietern
item.description:
_SG_
Ostpocke hat Folgendes geschrieben:
Die Anleihe (ISIN: XS2231806394) wird um 3 Jahre bis September 2028 verl√§ngert und der Kupon von 9,5% auf 12% angehoben. Aktuell notiert die bei ~96%.


F√ºr alle, die die alte Anleihe gehalten haben. Wurde das bei euch sauber umgestellt?
F√ºr meine Anteile wird inzwischen kein Kurs mehr gestellt.
Hatte auch erwartet eine Nachricht zur Verl√§ngerung vom Broker zu bekommen. Nichts...
Halte die Anleihe bei der DKB

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Firmeo
item.description:
Claus Lehmann
Zitat:
Firmeo: Shaping the Future of B2B Lending Dear investor, We have some very exciting news! Hive Finance is expanding again, launching one more lending business in the dynamic Polish market. Firmeo Business Finance is a new alternative lender that will soon join as our first loan originator focused exclusively on business loans. Firmeo specialises in financing micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs), businesses that often face challenges securing credit from traditional banks. With a fully online application process and credit decisions in as little as 24 hours, Firmeo makes funding accessible, fast, and transparent. Loan amounts will range from PLN 10,000 to PLN 500,000 (approx. ‚Ç¨2,300 - ‚Ç¨110,000), with flexible repayment terms between 3 and 12 months.

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Re: Ventus Energy Erfahrungen (Kraftwerke Lettland, 1% Bonus
item.description:
Claus Lehmann
Zahlungenvon und zu Trade Republic* funktionieren mit Ventus Energy* weiterhin nicht
Zitat:
At present, transactions to and from bank accounts are not being processed successfully. Deposits to your account and withdrawals back to are either being blocked or returned. What you should do: Please avoid using your bank account for deposits or withdrawals until further notice. To continue using our services without interruption, link a different bank account to your profile. You can verify the new account by sending a small transfer (e.g., ‚Ç¨0.01) from it. If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact us at . Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

item.title: P2P Kredite Forum:Esketit verlagert Plattform nach Kroatien
item.description:
Claus Lehmann
eben von Esketit* gekommen

Zitat:
Starting October 15, will transition from Ireland to a newly registered entity in Croatia. This move allows us to strengthen the platform and open up more opportunities for you. What does this mean for you? All your existing claim purchases remain current and valid under the same terms. You will only need to: üá≠üá∑Register under the Croatian entity ‚úÖVerify your account üìúAccept the new Terms of Use üó∫Ô∏èConfirm redirection of your claim repayments to Croatia If you decide to stay with the Irish entity, you‚Äôll still be able to manage your current portfolio and withdraw funds, but you won‚Äôt have access to new claim purchases, top-ups, or auto-purchase strategies. What‚Äôs expected in Croatia? Access to new claim purchases in both the primary and secondary markets Full top-up and withdrawal functionality Auto-purchase options based on your own strategy A new ‚Äúpending payments‚Äù feature for clearer cash flow visibility and stronger capital protection This move makes stronger, clearer, and better prepared for growth. We‚Äôll keep building so your money works the way it should.
